message.body: hey. leaving wednesday early am to go to a family thing in AZ. gotta get that $ from you mon or tues. lemme know how/when/where.
Prob tues. working tomorrow call you tomorrow night.

cool. hate to ask, but was counting on that for the trip.
does your friend want more? if so, freebies for you.
Yes I know, I'll handle it tomorrow I haven't been off set in days..totally sick and can't miss tomorrow I'll call ya tomorrow night..I'll find out.
cool cool. feel better. talk to you tomorrow pm.
